TEXT.English: The unrest in %s1_city has ended now. All business it back to normal.
TEXT.French: The unrest in %s1_city has ended now. All business it back to normal.
TEXT.German: Die Unruhen in %s1_city sind vorrüber. Das Tagesgeschäft in der Stadt nimmt wieder seinen normalen Lauf.
TEXT.Italian: The unrest in %s1_city has ended now. All business it back to normal.
TEXT.Spanish: The unrest in %s1_city has ended now. All business it back to normal.

TEXT.English: The ship called %s1_UnitName could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by the enemy.
TEXT.French: The ship %s1_UnitName could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by the enemy.
TEXT.German: Das Schiff %s1_UnitName konnte vor der Einnahme von %s2_CityName durch den Feind noch fliehen.
TEXT.Italian: The ship %s1_UnitName could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by the enemy.
TEXT.Spanish: The ship %s1_UnitName could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by the enemy.

TEXT.English: The ship %s1_UnitName of the enemy could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by your troops.
TEXT.French: The ship %s1_UnitName of the enemy could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by your troops.
TEXT.German: Das feindliche Schiff %s1_UnitName konnte vor der Einnahme von %s2_CityName durch eure Truppen noch fliehen.
TEXT.Italian: The ship %s1_UnitName of the enemy could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by your troops.
TEXT.Spanish: The ship %s1_UnitName of the enemy could escape %s2_CityName when it was captured by your troops.

TEXT.English: Reinforcement troops of our king have arrived because we were declared War on by the order of another king.
TEXT.French: Reinforcement troops of our king have arrived because we were declared War on by the order of another king.
TEXT.German: Unterstützungstruppen unseres Königs sind eingetroffen, da man us auf Befehl eines anderen Königs den Krieg erklärt hat.
TEXT.Italian: Reinforcement troops of our king have arrived because we were declared War on by the order of another king.
TEXT.Spanish: Reinforcement troops of our king have arrived because we were declared War on by the order of another king.
